settings.description: Secondary mirror z-coordinate, relative to corrector surface 2
settings.name: z_sec

settings.description: Primary mirror z-coordinate, relative to secondary mirror
settings.name: z_prim

settings.description: Image plane z-coordinate, relative to primary mirror vertex
settings.name: z_img

settings.description: Central obstruction z-coordinate, relative to corrector surface 1
settings.name: z_obs
commentsinfile
settings.value:
Aspheric Even Lens 3D

Aspheric lens with either concave or convex surfaces. The surface sag is specified by a conic plus a polynomial defined by the sum of the first 11 even terms. The normalization unit for the aspheric coefficients should be specified. The aspheric surface diameters can be smaller than the outer lens diameter. Clear apertures which are smaller than the surface diameters can be also specified.

settings.name: commentsinfile
settings.value:
Spherical Mirror 3D

Spherical mirror. The mirror surface may be either concave or convex. A central hole may or may not be present. A clear aperture which is smaller than the mirror surface diameter can be specified.

settings.name: commentsinfile
settings.value:
Circular Planar Annulus

Circular planar annulus with negligible thickness.

settings.description: Avoid inverted elements by curving interior domain elements
settings.name: curvedinterior

settings.description: Recompute all plot data after solving
settings.name: autoregenerateplot

settings.description: Reevaluate all evaluation groups after solving
settings.name: autoregenerateevalgroups

settings.description: Ask to save application when closing
settings.name: asktosave
